skilllist.skilldesc:
Nolan's skills will leave a <font color="a6aafb">Rift</font>. When a rift comes into contact with another rift, they will <font color="a6aafb">activate</font> and pull enemies to their center and deal 240<font color="fba51f"> (+140% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> after a short delay. Each time a rift activation hits an enemy, Nolan will gain 20 Energy. If an enemy is hit by multiple rift activations, the damage after the first hit will be reduced by 40%.
<font color="a6aafb">Cosmic Leap</font>: If Nolan does not deal or take damage for 5s, he enhances his next Basic Attack to dash to the target, dealing <font color="fba51f"> (+120% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and leaving a <font color="a6aafb">Rift</font>. (Damage to and from Minions or Creeps will not prevent Nolan from getting this effect.)

Nolan cuts a rectangular area in front of him with his cosmic gauge, dealing 230<font color="fba51f"> (+40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and leaving a <font color="a6aafb">Rift</font> at the first enemy hit.

Nolan charges in the target direction and slashes with his cosmic gauge, dealing 70<font color="fba51f"> (+13% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in his path and leaving a <font color="a6aafb">Rift</font>.

Nolan slashes at the target location 3 times, dealing 120<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> with each slash while leaving 3 rifts and slowing the target hit by 30% for 0.5s. The rifts will be activated automatically while Nolan dashes backward.

data.name: Nolan
data.story: A scholar that wanders the universe with split souls to save his daughter.

assist.desc: Nolan works well with Tanks that can initiate and CC the enemy so Nolan to focus on dealing as much damage as possible, such as Tigreal and Gatotkaca.

strong.desc: Nolan counters squishy heroes that lack mobility skills like Hanabi and Eudora because they have a hard time avoiding his rifts while Nolan's own mobility makes them easy targets.

weak.desc: Nolan is countered by tanky heroes with high sustained damage, such as Thamuz and Fredrinn, who can survive Nolan's burst and kill him afterwards.
